data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 2, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Luis Leal for Tijuana de Caliente drives towards goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Toluca.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Toluca needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Toluca have got their heads in front thanks to a Rubens Sambueza strike.
In the minute 9, Alexis Canelo instrumental with a fine assist.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Toluca throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Toluca in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Goal! Jonatan Maidana extends Toluca lead to 2-0 with a header.
Rubens Sambueza with an assist there.
In the minute 18, Tijuana de Caliente's Marcel Ruiz breaks free at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Fernando Guerrero awards Toluca a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Tijuana de Caliente drives forward and Jordi Cortizo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Raul Lopez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 30, Tolucaâ€™s Raul Lopez is on his feet again at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 34, Toluca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Tijuana de Caliente will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Toluca.
Can Toluca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Fernando Guerrero awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 39, In Toluca Toluca attack through William da Silva. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Toluca are pushing forward but Michael Estrada's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toluca.
Tijuana de Caliente pushes forward through Luis Leal, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Tijuana de Caliente's Marcel Ruiz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Toluca.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Toluca's half.
In the minute 45, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Toluca to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Mauro Lainez is replacing Aldo Cruz for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Edgar Lopez is replacing Marcel Ruiz for the away team.
Tijuana de Caliente make their third substitution with Christian Rivera replacing Jordan Silva.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Jordan Rezabala with Fabian Castillo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
In the minute 47, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero awards Toluca a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Mauro Lainez of Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick Toluca.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In the minute 65, Carlos Morales (Toluca) is making a first substitution, with Kevin Castaneda replacing Michael Estrada.
Javier Guemez is on a sub for Antonio Rios for Toluca.
In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 69, Toluca to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Free kick in a good position for Toluca!
Pablo Guede is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Bryan Angulo replacing David Barbona.
In the minute 71, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 74, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In the minute 78, Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Toluca throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
The home team replace William da Silva with Giovanny Leon.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Toluca.
Luis Leal for Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente, close to Toluca's area.
Fernando Guerrero awards Toluca a goal kick.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Diego Gonzalez with Adrian Mora. This is the fourth substitution made today by Carlos Morales.
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 86, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Enrique Triverio is replacing Alexis Canelo for the home team.
Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
